title: Arbiter of Grand Idea Mafia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player's house to become GIM during the first night. You cannot move GIM, unless that player dies.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who visit GIM are subjected to the following effects in the order:
> - Scumcasted
> - Stolen from, like literally yoinked
> - AGL-8 Grenade Machine Gunned
> - Off by one errored
> - Triple tapped
> - Negative attacked
> - Entered into a bacin
> - Urticated
> - Covered in frost
- If a player dies, the effects after are still applied.
- GIM remains after you die.
- With the Necronomicon, you may have two GIMs active at a time.
